entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
